article: Here is an examination notice . Mrs . Dickson gave it to her students last week . Read it and answer the questions . To the students of Class 3 * Examinations start on June 22 and end on June 23 . * The time for each of the subjects is : English June 22 9 : 30 A . M . - 10 : 30 A . M . Math June 22 11 : 00 A . M . - 12 : 00 A . M . History June 22 2 : 30 P . M . - 3 : 30 P . M . PE June 23 8 : 00 A . M . - 10 : 00 A . M . Music June 23 1 : 00 P . M . - 3 : 00 P . M . * For the PE test , go to the playground . For the music test , go to the Piano Room . All else are written tests . They will be held in classroom 3 . * No student can get into the examination room more than 15 minutes after the exam starts . * No food or drink during ANY test . * No dictionaries during the English exam . * Wear sports shoes and clothes for the PE exam . If you have questions , go to the Teachers ' Office before the tests .
questions: Tom still has some questions about the exams , he can

model: go to the teachers ' office on june 21 and ask about them
go to the teacher ' s office on june 21
human: ask his teacher on June 22 or June 23
go to the teachers ' office on June 21 and ask about them
